==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|ごう|ご}}
Possibly from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ごうご}} compound {{m|ltc|合期|tr=*hop *ghiə|lit=meeting a deadline}}. Alternately, may have been coined in Japan of {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ごうご}}-derived elements {{m|ja|合|tr=gō||to meet}} + {{m|ja|期|tr=go||a period of time}}.

{{IPAchar|/gafugo/}} > {{IPAchar|/gaugo/}} > {{IPAchar|/gɔːgo/}} > {{IPAchar|/goːgo/}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|ごうご|acc=0}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ごうご|hhira=がふご}}

# [[favorable]] [[progress]]
# [[meet]]ing a [[deadline]], [[be]]ing [[on time]]

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|ごうご|hhira=がふご|tr=intransitive}}

# to make [[favorable]] [[progress]], to [[proceed]] as [[expected]]
# to [[meet]] a [[deadline]], to [[be]] [[on time]]

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|ごうご}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|がっ|こ}}
Variant of [[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']] reading, using the unvoiced ''ko'' reading for {{ja-l|期}}.

{{IPAchar|/gafuko/}} > {{IPAchar|/gakko/}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=on|がっこ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|がっこ}}

# [[favorable]] [[progress]]
# [[meet]]ing a [[deadline]], [[be]]ing [[on time]]

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|がっこ|tr=intransitive}}

# to make [[favorable]] [[progress]], to [[proceed]] as [[expected]]
# to [[meet]] a [[deadline]], to [[be]] [[on time]]

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|がっこ}}
